question: Why am I being forced to give an assessment in full-screen mode?
answer: This is because an assessment administrator has enabled Secure Mode for the assessment. You would only be ble to give an assessment in full-screen mode. In case you switch tabs or open a new window, your assessment will be flagged to the assessment administrator.
